name: Ninja World War：Destiny
description:
Join this wonderful ninja world for amazing adventures and battles! In the game, players can play any ninja to experience refreshing combo battles, classic teams and bonds, and exciting strategy modes. Come and show what you can do as a ninja!

[Features]

Gorgeous Ninjutsu to Dazzle you
Passion will lead to the most gorgeous Ninjutsu. A great variety of wonderful Ninjutsu, including Rasengan, Chidori, Tsukuyomi, etc. They will never disappoint you, and your talent will always be recognized!

Get Companions to Fight Together
There'll be Group, Home, and Raid for you to make like-minded friends and experience the delight of fighting side by side with them.

Easy Battles and Offline Earnings
The modes are diversified, easy and casual. Players can get offline earnings, and only need to remain online for 1 hour a day to get stronger!
